phrases.original: When you send an invite by text message or e-mail, by default the message only contains the name of the event and a link. But you can add additional text below the link, for a more personal touch.
phrases.translated: When you send an invite by text message or e-mail, by default the message only contains the name of the event and a link. But you can add additional text below the link, for a more personal touch.

phrases.original: Hi, it's {NAME}. Nice to meet you. I hope you can join us.
phrases.translated: Hi, it's {NAME}. Nice to meet you. I hope you can join us.

phrases.original: When someone that you have invited views or interacts with their invite, this shows that they are interested. We can send you a notification when this happens, enabling you to promptly follow up.
phrases.translated: When someone that you have invited views or interacts with their invite, this shows that they are interested. We can send you a notification when this happens, enabling you to promptly follow up.
